item.description:
Rick Shrier, is setting out for a weekend in Cornish, ME so this is a great excuse to ride north.
We will meet Rick at Dunkin Donuts on Rt. East Bound, in Westborough, just east of Lyman St. and depart from there at 8:30 AM.

Rick will lead the ride up to Cornish, ME here is the proposed route;

http://maps.google.co...

From that point on, I am plotting a route north to Fryeburg, ME then west toward North Conway, NH and take Rt. 302/10 through the White Mountains and then continue on Rt. 10 with a brief giddy-up on I 89, then stay on Rt. 10 to Rt. 119 back toward Concord, MA and Rt. 2. I am continuing on to Boston, but of course everyone can should break off and head to their own destinations.

The weather is predicted to be dry in the high 70's bright and sunny, ideal for a great, late, summer ride.
We can make a few stops but this has the potential to be a longer ride and extra layers maybe a good idea since it most likely will be after sunset before we return back to Boston.
item.name: Cornish, ME and Beyond
